mapper.select: select c.cart_no, c.category_no, c.user_no, c.Registration_date, c.quantity, c.product_no, p.title, p.brand, p.price, p.shipping_cost, p.itemimg, co.cartoption_no, co.detailoption_no from cart c left join product p on c.product_no = p.product_no left join cart_option co on c.cart_no = co.cart_no left join option_detail od on co.detailoption_no = od.detailoption_no where user_no = #{user_no}
